description: See your gaming in a new light with the Afterglow Wave Wired Controller for Xbox! Customize your gameplay, create colorful displays, and more with this officially licensed controller. Make waves with the millions of colors and combinations of the Afterglow Wave Wired Controller's RBG lights and settings. Cycle through different lighting effects and colors using the "function" button or download the free PDP Control Hub app to change the eight RGB lighting zones and more. Customize your controller even further, in the app, with countless options like re-mapping buttons, reconfiguring triggers, or adjusting deadzones. Take down the ops quickly and efficiently by mapping controller functions to the two programmable back buttons. Use the built-in volume controls on the D-pad, and quick mic mute, to make rapid-fire adjustments without ruining your immersion. Get improved accuracy and all-day comfort with the controller’s textured grips and triggers. Plug in the included, 8-foot USB-C cable and start showing off your true colors.
features: ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATIONS - Handpick lighting effects, colors, brightness and more for 8 individual RGB zones using the free PDP Control Hub App. Here you can also re-map buttons, adjust deadzones, and sync audio.
WIRED COMPATIBILITY - Cross-compatible for Xbox and Windows PC via USB
ALL DAY GAMING ERGONOMICS - Laser-etched texture on grips & triggers provide comfort and accuracy.
OFFICIALLY LICENSED - Officially licensed by Xbox for Xbox Series X|S, and compatible with Xbox One and Windows 10/11.
Includes an 8ft, detachable USB-C cable for plenty of room to play without the need for batteries.

items.text: Put through Xbox's rigorous quality and safety testing to become an officially licensed product.

Game/Chat Balance
Quickly adjust your game/chat balance without having to go into the console settings. Simply use the "Function" button and right/left on the D-pad.

Textured Triggers
Added texture for increased accuracy, so you never miss your shot.

Programmable Back Buttons
Bind controller commands to the back buttons for quicker access to actions like jump, crouch/slide, reload, change weapons, and more.

Function Button/Mic Mute
Function" button can be used with the D-pad to adjust volume and game/chat balance, is used for programming the back buttons, and doubles as a mic mute button when you hit it twice.

Share Button
Share photos and videos of those epic game-winning moves, or face-palming fails, using the dedicated Share button.

title: Razer Kishi V2 Mobile Gaming Controller for Android: Console Quality Controls - Universal Fit - Stream PC, Xbox, PlayStation, Touch Screen Android Games - Customizable Triggers - Ergonomic Design
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Gaming Accessories › Controllers
description: Rethink everything you knew about mobile gaming. Razer Kishi v2 is a universal mobile gaming controller that brings a console-class gameplay experience to your smartphone. Play the best AAA games, on your mobile phone, exactly as you’d expect to play them on a game console – zero compromises.
features: CONSOLE QUALITY MOBILE GAMING CONTROLS — Designed with cutting-edge microswitch buttons, analog triggers, and programmable macros to bring console-quality control to the phone
UNIVERSAL FIT WITH EXTENDABLE BRIDGE — Features a stable, extendable bridge that perfectly holds most popular Android smartphones, providing a secure fit that won’t come loose while gaming

DISCOVER THE BEST GAMES IN ONE PLACE FOR FREE — Browse through 1,000 plus compatible games, record and share gameplay, and keep Kishi updated with an integrated Razer Nexus App that allows full customizability

VIRTUAL CONTROLLER MODE — Play many of the most popular touch screen only Android games by mapping buttons on the Kishi V2 to touch controls (requires software update for the Razer Nexus app and a firmware update for Kishi V2)
STREAM PC AND CONSOLE GAMES — Play full PC, Xbox, and PlayStation games directly on the phone, with support for the biggest game streaming apps

OPTIMIZED FOR MAXIMUM PERFORMANCE — By utilizing the smartphone’s USB-C connection, Kishi V2 eliminates input latency, allowing for responsive, seamless control—and features passthrough charging so the phone can be powered when gaming
ERGONOMIC DESIGN — Designed for long gaming sessions, yet slim enough to fit into a pocket, the controller is optimized for both comfort and portability

Enable controller compatibility* for the biggest mobile games with a Razer Nexus app feature that allows you to remap touch screen controls to the Razer Kishi V2. 
*Games may have specific rules about whether touch screen remapping is allowed. 
Inputs 	Two analog thumbstickswith clickable buttons (L3/R3) | One mechanical D-pad | ABXY face buttons | Two triggers (L2/R2) | Two bumpers (L1/R1) | Two programmable multifunction buttons (M1/M2) | Menu and Options buttons (labelled Start and Select in some games) | Sharebutton (requires Razer Nexus) 	
Ports 	TYPE C plug for phone connection | TYPE C port for passthrough charging only | Charging indicator light 	
Dimensions and Weight 	Height: 33.9mm | Width: 180.7mm | Length: 92.2mm | Weight: 123g 	
Device Size Compatibility 	Max dimensions: 11.5mm (thickness, including case and camera) x 170mm (length) Remove or swap the included rubber cushions to give your device a secure fit. 	
Samsung Compatibility 	Samsung Galaxy S9/S9+/S10/S10+/S20 Series/S21 Series/S22 Series/S23 Series/Note 8/Note 9/Note 10/Note 10+ 	
Google Pixel Compatibility 	Google Pixel 2/2 XL/3/3XL/4/4XL/5 Series/6 Series / 7 	
Other Android Compatibility 	Razer Phone 1 / 2 and many other Android Devices 	
Does Kishi V2 for Android work with iPhone 15? 
Kishi V2 for Android supports gameplay for iPhone 15 but is not compatible with Razer Nexus on iOS. 
Which device is the Razer Kishi V2 compatible with? 
•Max dimensions: 11.5mm (thickness, including camera) x 170mm (length) 
•Samsung Galaxy S9/S9+/S10/S10+/S20 Series/S21 Series/S22 Series/Note 8/Note 9/Note 10/Note 10+ 
•Google Pixel 2/2 XL/3/3XL/4/4XL/5 Series/6 Series 
•Razer Phone 1/Phone 2 
Which games can I play with Razer Kishi V2? 
Kishi V2 for works with games that have controller support. Not all games or streaming/remote play services have controller support for Android. Use Virtual Controller Mode via Razer Nexus to map touch screen controls to your Razer Kishi V2. 
Do I have to remove my phone from a case before connecting it to Razer Kishi V2? 
Razer Kishi V2 is not certified for use with cases however, its flexible design has been confirmed to work with some. Remove the included rubber cushions from the Kishi V2 to increase the size of the supported device. 
Does Razer Kishi V2 support phones with screen protectors? 
Razer Kishi V2 is designed to support screen protectors of many sizes on many different phones. Although we cannot always support, Razer Kishi V2 should work with most screen protectors with a maximum thickness of 0.3mm.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
ZD-V+ USB Wired Gaming Controller Gamepad For PC/Laptop Computer(Windows XP/7/8/10/11) & PS3 & Android & Steam - [Black] 
ZD-V+ Wired Game Controller / Gamepad 
ZD-V+ controller is compatible with PC Windows (Xp/7/8/10) or later versions, Android 4.0 and PS3 via wired connection, working great with Laptop/PC, Android smart phones, TV boxes, tablets and PS3. This game controller can identify all the deices automatically, no need driver installation. 
Matters Needing Attention 
The device doesn't support Xbox 360 / Xbox One / Mac OS / PS4.
DirectX 9.0c or above may be installed if the device is to be used in Windows 10 or above.
If the device is unable to be used in Windows systems, please try to install the latest version of Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller gamepad driver.
The vibration-feedback function can only be used in PC games supporting Xinput mode and the function may need to be enabled in games.
If you want to use the controller in devices with Micro-USB interfaces, you need to purchase OTG adapter or cable separately.
Package List 
1x English Instruction Manual
1x ZD-V+ Wired Gamepad(equipped with 1.5M USB cable)
Feature 
(1) It supports plug and play, only for PC games supporting Xinput mode / Play Sation 3. Some games may need to set the buttons or use third-party software before use. 
(2) Vibration Feedback Function. 
(3) Multi-mode: Xinput / DirectInput(D-input). 
(4) JD-SWTICH Function, which can exchange the functions of D-pad and Left-Stick in Xinput mode. 
(5) Product Size: 150x105x65mm 
(6) Product Weight: 216g 
(7) Supporting Interface: USB 2.0 / 3.0 
Excellent Design 
Ergonomic, and excellent design with high-quality material. 
ZD-V+ controller features brief and smooth streamline, it feels firmly, and comfortable to your palm with the texturing in the surface. The layout of the buttons is so humanized as to operate fluently and efficiently. 
JD-SWITCH Function 
This feature is very powerful, you can use the D-pad or Left-stick follow your heart in the game. 
In PC Windows and Xinput mode, you can switch the function between D-pad and Left Stick by pressing the BACK + LSB（press the Left Stick vertically） key combinations. 
High Precision D-pad 
Separated design, give you the best gaming experience, let the game control follow your heart. 
Non-slip Joystick 
Rough surface, non-slip texture, high precision components, This makes the joystick experience better in the game. 
Vibration Feedback 
The different vibration intensity allows you to have a real feedback in different scenes of games. The vibration-feedback function can only be used in PC games supporting Xinput mode and the function may need to be enabled in games.

features: Wide Compatibility: The Switch controller works with Nintendo Switch/Lite/OLED, Apple devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac, TV, Apple Arcade MFi Games), Android devices (phone, tablet, Android TV, TV boxes), PC/Laptop (Windows 7 8 9 10 11), and Steam

Programmable: The Bluetooth gaming controller features 2 programmable buttons that can map A/B/X/Y/L/R/ZL/ZR/Left Joystick/Right Joystick/D-pad/+/- to AR/AL and record up to 30 seconds of the gaming operation, which makes it even easier to win the game

Additional Features: Enjoy this PC gaming controller with other functions, such as cool RGB light, wake-up, screenshot, ergonomic design, and a built-in 800 mAh rechargeable battery for up to 15-20 hours of gameplay

modules.title: Razer Wolverine Ultimate for Xbox One
modules.subtitle: Customize to Conquer
modules.text: Play anywhere with the Razer Wolverine Ultimate, the most customizable controller for competitive play both on Xbox One & PC. From interchangeable thumbsticks & D-Pad to a total of 6 remappable Multi-Function Buttons, the Razer Wolverine Ultimate can be adapted to suit your individual needs.

items.text:
Automatic Hair-Trigger Mode with Trigger Stops
When activated, the mechanical stop-switches greatly reduce travel distance to the two main triggers. So all you need to do is press slightly to instantly launch full rapid fire.

Quick Control Panel
From toggling between profiles to adjusting both game volume and mic mute, the Quick Control Panel features four buttons for easy access to a whole range of functions.

Interchangeable Thumbsticks & D-Pad
Swap between optimized thumbstick heights and shapes, and quickly change between a tilting or individual D-Pad button layout for the best comfort and gameplay.

Ergonomic Multi-Function Buttons Layout
The Razer Wolverine Ultimate comes loaded with a slew of extra buttons for advanced gaming—2 remappable Multi-Function bumpers, 4 Multi-Function triggers and a Quick Control Panel.

Compatible with Xbox One or PC
The Razer Wolverine Ultimate is compatible with Xbox One or PC so you can pick your preferred mode of play—with the same ultimate enjoyment.

features: 【Pink Pro Controller for Multi-Platform 】 Compatible with Nintendo Switch/Lite/OLED, Windows PC, Steam, Steam Deck, both wireless and wired connections are available, and also wirelessly connect with iOS devices (IOS 13.4 and above) and Android devices (Android 10.0 and above ); Great for Genshin Impact, Fortnite, Zelda, Mario Kart, etc.

【Hall Sensor Joystick】The Mytrix Pro controller is designed with a Hall sensor joystick, addressing the common issue of joystick drift found in traditional gaming controllers. Its sensitive and smooth sticks eliminate drift, offering accurate, no dead-zone control and providing a precise gaming experience

【Turbo Function & Macro Definition】3 Adjustable turbo speeds providing auto pressing / shooting 5/15/25 shots/s; 1-Click to turn on and off; Saves your thumb & finger from button mashing. The switch remote controllers add 4 additional back buttons to customize the way you play, you can edit any complex operation as an M button

【3.5mm Audio Jack & RGB lighting Mode 】 3.5mm stereo headset port supports the wired headset audio & chats via the controller's wired communication with the console. ABXY buttons with LED backlight, 4 RGB lighting modes for Joystick to create a game atmosphere. 【Note】Our controllers come with 1-Year warranty

【Motion Control & 4 Adjustable Vibration Levels】6-Axis Gyro motion sensors enhance accuracy for precise movement controls, improve motion aiming & turning performance; Dual motors with 4 levels adjustable vibration intensity

【Home Button Remote Wake-Up & 600mAh Battery】Press the Home button to auto-connect to & remotely wake up the NS console from the sleep mode; Built-in 600mAh rechargeable battery for 18 hours of game play on a single charge. USB C to A cable included

【Unique Cherry Blossom & Ergonomic Design】Wireless pro controller with cherry blossom flowers, stylish design. Built with high-quality non-slip ABS and an ergonomic grip, provides a comfortable hold and optimal weight for extended gameplay

【Great Gift】 Are you still worried about finding the perfect gift for girl, student, friend, child, family? whether it's for thanksgiving, Christmas, a birthday, or any special occasion? A wonderful wireless controller can be a delightful choice. So go ahead and surprise your loved ones with it, and let the adventures begin!

title: PowerA GameCube Style Wireless Controller for Nintendo Switch - Toad
inStockText: In Stock  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Video Games › Nintendo Switch › Accessories › Controllers
description: GameCube style controllers are widely considered the preferred way to play Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. Pull off precise attacks using octagonal gated sticks, larger A button, and nostalgic muscle memory on this officially licensed Bluetooth wireless controller for Nintendo Switch. The original GameCube design has been improved with larger shoulder buttons and D-pad, plus added left shoulder and system buttons for compatibility across all Nintendo Switch games*. Enjoy up to 30 hours of gameplay with two new AA alkaline batteries**. * Can be used when Nintendo Switch is docked or undocked. Does not support HD rumble, IR, or Amiibo NFC  ** Other variables affect play-time
features: The preferred gamepad for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
Wireless freedom using Bluetooth 5.0
Classic GameCube design plus larger D-pad and added left shoulder button
Motion controls and system buttons added for compatibility across all Nintendo Switch games*
Player indicator and low battery warning LED
Includes two AA batteries for up to 30 hours of gameplay**
Wireless gaming controller officially licensed for Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch (OLED model) and Nintendo Switch Lite
Two-year limited warranty - visit PowerA.com/Support

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The officially licensed PowerA Nano Wired Controller for Nintendo Switch combines standard-size controls with a compact frame. Now, players of all sizes can game with ergonomic comfort on a high-quality controller. The standard-size ABXY button layout is larger than the Joy-Con buttons to provide a familiar comfortable feel for even the most intense sessions. Precision-tuned analog thumbsticks and ultra-responsive triggers provide optimum performance for any game. Plus, original designs from world-class artists feature stunning graphics and iconic characters that represent your style and favorite games. Includes an 8 ft. (2.4 m) micro-USB cable. 
Wireless freedom 
Nearly half the cost of wireless.
No batteries or charging to manage.
Reduced input latency/lag compared to wireless.
Instant plug & play connection (no sync required).
Gaming is better together 
Nintendo Switch allows up to eight controller connections in docked mode, or you can link up to eight systems together to play in tabletop mode. Compared to Joy-Con controllers, Enhanced Wireless Controllers offer improved accuracy and comfort plus larger buttons. Now that you have a more affordable wireless option available in a variety of colors and designs, pick up one or more, gather your friends, and share the fun. 
PowerA Quality Promise 
At PowerA, our controllers are designed by passionate gamers. Our team has over two decades of experience in the gaming industry designing across all platforms. You will be amazed at the features and quality built into this controller. Finally, you can trust PowerA products to perform since we back our products for 2 years. 
Officially Licensed 
Officially licensed by Nintendo. PowerA products have gone through Nintendo’s rigorous testing and evaluation processes to ensure compatibility with the Nintendo Switch.

title: YCCSKY Wireless PC Gaming Controller for Windows (7/8/10/11), Compatible Nintendo Switch and Steam Deck, 9 Color LED Light Gamepad with Turbo Function, Adjustable Vibration & Headphone Jack（2.4G）
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Controllers
features: 【Wide Compatibility】The pc controller works with Windows system PC Computer & Laptop(7/8/10/11), Android system phones and Tablets, PS3, Steam deck, AndroidTV Box. Multifunctional game controller is your perfect choice for leisure and entertainment.

【Long Play Time】The computer controller is built with an 600mAh large-capacity battery embedded in the gamepad, so you don’t need to replace the battery. One charge lasts up to 15 hours. If the battery runs out, just plug in the USB cable and keep your gaming going.

【Connectivity Mode】Our wireless PC gaming controller has 2.4G wireless connection mode, WIFI connection mode and USB-C wired connection mode; the main 2.4G wireless connection mode can be connected at a long distance, and you no longer have to worry about being limited by the distance.

【Macro keys and Tubro-function】There are 2 Macro keys, namely M1 and M2, and Set key on the back. The PC controller's Turbo-function has three speeds, 8Hz-15Hz-25Hz, The default value is 15Hz, No need for indicator light.

【Adjustable Funtion】The built-in asymmetric motor can adjust the vibration amplitude, you can experience the best feeling in different games, and the built-in 3.5MM headphone jack, the game sound you hear makes you immersive. 9-color adjustable lights, colorful appearance, let your sense of immersion reach the best state.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Is iCUE required to use this product? 
iCUE is required for initial setup and to fully unlock all of Envision's features. However, Envision is functional without iCUE running after the initial installation and many features, like hardware button mappings, still function normally. 
Is Envision compatible with PC and Mac? Do I need additional drivers? 
The Envision is only compatible with PC (Windows 10+). 
It is not compatible with OS or Linux. 
For the controller to be recognized and work on your computer, you need iCUE for the driver that works with your controller. 
Do I need batteries with SCUF Envision? 
The Envision Pro has a built-in battery. The battery should last around 19 hours with normal use. The Envision does not have a battery and does not need one. It only runs off of direct power from the PC to the controller via USB-C. 
Can I use thumbstick toppers with SCUF Envision? 
Yes, you can use Thumbstick Grips Tactic, Thumbstick Grips Catalyst, Thumbstick Grips Pulse. 
What are the thumbstick sizes for SCUF Envision? 
We offer different thumbstick sizes: 
Short Concave - 24x24x16mm, Short Domed - 24x24x19mm 
Long Concave - 24x24x20mm, Long Domed - 24x24x22mm

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Wireless Controller Compatible With Xbox 360/ Xbox 360 Slim 
How to Connect to the Xbox 360 Console or PC? 
1. Turn on the console/PC 
2. Install The Battery: 
Put the battery into the battery box (the battery box is marked with the positive and negative poles of the battery), and put it to the On the back of the controller. The 4 lights of the HOME button on the controller will flash quickly. 
3. Insert The Receiver: 
Insert the receiver into the USB port of the console/PC, and the green light of the receiver will flash quickly. 
4. Pairing State: 
Both the lights of the controller and adapter will flash for 3-5s. Once pairing, the light of the controller and the receiver keeps on (wireless connection); the light of the receiver flashes for 10 seconds and then turns off (wired connection). 
Note: If the controller fails to pair automatically after the above steps are completed, please press and hold the Pairing Button on the controller for 2s; The controller enters the pairing mode, and the light of the HOME button will start to flash rapidly. Once pairing, the light of the controller and the receiver will keep on. 
About Connecting More Than 2 Controllers To The Xbox 360 
A receiver cannot be used for multiple xbox 360 controllers. 
If you want to connect 4 controllers to the Xbox, you need to ensure that there are 4 usb ports on the Xbox, because one controller must correspond to one adapter. 
If you want to connect 4pcs xbox 360 wireless controllers to the xbox at the same time, that means you should plug 4 receivers into the Xbox, otherwise the controllers won't be able to complete the connection. 
Precise D-Pad 
High quality 8-way directional pad and two analog pressure-point triggers help you stay in perfect control. 
Upgraded Joysticks 
Just the same as the joystick of the official wireless 360 controller. Spend less money to enjoy the same sensitivity 
Original Chip 
Efficiently processes and transmits data, which shortens the controller's response time to each instruction. 
Rumble Control - Double Shock 
Built-in two 4-piece motors are more durable and provide better rumble experience than other 3rd wireless 360 controller. 
Ergonomic Design 
Great new look with a matte black finish and gloss accents. Award winning compact ergonomics provide a more comfortable gaming experience. 
Comfortable To Hold 
Grips and contours have been designed to fit your hands more comfortably, all the buttons and controls make your hand very comfortable for long periods of gameplay. 
Reasons for Key or Joystick Drifting or Uncontrolled 
It may be caused by accidentally touching the button or joystick while installing the battery, which causes the button or joystick to memorize and maintain this position. For example, when installing the battery, if your hand move the left joystick up, after the controller is connected, the joystick will remain up when using. That's why the joystick doesn't listen to commands. 
Solution: 
Please remove the battery and install it again. When installing the battery, please do not touch any buttons or joysticks.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Immersive gaming experience for more realistic feeling in the games. 
Accurately perceive changes in direction and visual field. 
Built-in six-axis gyro sensor detects and makes a quick response in motion-sensing games. 
Press [Turbo] + [A / B / X / Y / L / ZL / R / ZR] to activate. 
Q : How to connect the controller by using Bluetooth 
Please select Switch mode on a controller and use Bluetooth to connect the Tesla system. 
Q : I use the USB-C port in center console but controller can't work. 
For 2022 Model 3/Y center console configured charging functionality without data transmission. Please use the Glovebox USB-A port to connect. 
Q : Why I can't play the super sonic when connect the controller 
Please push the + button to start the super sonic. 
For more Question. 
If you have any question about the controller, please leave message. 
Support 4 players play in the model X/S 
Our controller supports up to four players simultaneously in the Model S/X. 
To connect controllers, please follow these instructions: 
Pair two controllers via Bluetooth.
Use two wireless dongles, which can be installed on our JOWUA 3-Port USB HUB with DashCam Reader. Alternatively, you can install them on our JOWUA Hub Bar Mini designed for the Tesla Model S/X.
Alternatively, you can use four wireless dongles: 
Install two wireless dongles on the JOWUA 3-Port USB HUB with DashCam Reader.
Install two additional wireless dongles on the JOWUA Hub Bar Mini for the Tesla Model S/X.
This setup allows you to enjoy multiplayer gaming with up to four joysticks simultaneously.

title: PowerA FUSION Pro Wireless Controller for Xbox Series X|S with Lumectra, gamepad, wired video game controller, gaming controller, Officially Licensed for Xbox Series X|S and works on Xbox One and Windows 10/11
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Controllers
description: Step up your game with the officially licensed PowerA FUSION Pro Wireless Controller for Xbox Series X|S with Lumectra™. This controller features Ghost RGB LED lighting that reveals a stunning hidden design when activated with 6 lighting modes across 4 customizable zones. Easily adjust the Quick-Twist Thumbsticks to three different height settings using a simple twist mid-game:no need to swap out parts. The Hall Effect Modules in the thumbsticks provide a more pro-level feel to help with precision and longevity. Plus, additional features such as low latency wireless, 4 mappable advanced gaming buttons, up to 30-hours of battery life and more. Includes a magnetic charger, 10 ft. braided USB-C® cable, display stand and protective case.
features: Ghost RGB LED Lighting – The controller reveals a stunning hidden design when the RGB LED lighting is activated and has 6 unique lighting modes across 4 customizable zones bringing the power of FUSION to life

Quick-Twist Thumbsticks – Easily adjust the height for each thumbstick in the middle of a game with a simple twist: no need to swap out parts. Three height settings for each thumbstick let you customize them to your gameplay style
Hall Effect Modules – Contact-free magnetic sensors in the thumbsticks provide a more fluid pro-level feel to help with precision and longevity
Low-Latency Wireless - Play wirelessly interference-free on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Windows 10/11 using the included Wireless USB Adapter
Advanced Gaming Buttons – Get an edge over the competition with 4 mappable buttons that you can program on the fly, mid-game—no system settings to configure

Charge and Display – Get up to 30 hours of gameplay with the internal rechargeable battery.* Includes a magnetic charger with detachable 10 ft. braided USB-C cable to recharge the controller plus a display stand to show off the controller when not in use
3-Way Trigger Locks – Set the travel distance of the triggers with three different positions to pull off quicker actions in your favorite FPS games or go full throttle in a high-end race car
Immersive Gaming – Dual rumble motors and impulse triggers add lifelike tactile details to your games while a 3.5mm stereo jack delivers clear dynamic audio*
Share Button and Profile Button – Capture epic screenshots or video clips and share them online. Switch between 3 different profiles to keep your optimal settings accessible for your favorite games
Custom Protective Case – Store your controller, cable and magnetic charger in a premium zip-up case

Reveal a stunning hidden design on the controller faceplate when the RGB LED lighting is activated with 6 lighting modes across 4 customizable zones bringing the power of FUSION to life. Lighting modes include – Solid, Cycle, Breathing, Wave, Pulse Reactive, Ripple Reactive

PowerA Gamer HQ App 
Configure your controller with an intuitive on-screen interface. Create multiple profiles to store different settings for RGB lighting, triggers, deadzones, audio levels, vibration strength and more—even remap any buttons for the ideal control in your favorite game on Xbox or Windows 10/11 app.

title: Multi-Platform PC Wireless Controller, Bluetooth Gaming Controller, Compatible with Windows, iPad, Steam, Luna, Laptop, Mac, Tablet, and Smart TV, with Double Shock, Macro Keys, Turbo Button, LED Backlight
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Controllers
features: Multi-platform Compatibility: Take your gaming experience to new heights with our Multi-Platform Wireless Gaming Controller. With compatibility for Windows, iPad, Steam, Laptop, Mac, Tablet, Smart TV, iPhone, Android, Phone, and TV Box, this gamepad lets you enjoy your favorite games no matter where you go. It's the perfect choice for those looking for an iPad controller or a PC controller wireless option.

Customized Buttons & Vibration Feedback: Immerse yourself in the game with adjustable dual vibration motors and programmable macro keys that allow you to create shortcuts and easily perform complex actions. The turbo button enables you to quickly fire weapons or perform other actions with ease. It's a must-have for anyone looking for a PC game controller or a Bluetooth game controller.

Comfortable Design & Diverse Gaming Experience: Game controller is designed for maximum comfort and versatility, featuring ergonomically designed grips and adjustable LED backlighting that ensures a secure grip and allows you to play games even in low-light conditions without disturbing your family or children.

Easy to Carry & Connect: With a built-in 600mAh Li-ion battery, you can enjoy hours of uninterrupted gaming on the go. Switch between 4 different connection modes to meet all your device needs. It's the perfect Bluetooth controller for those who love to game on the move.

Connection Method: The game controller offers four modes: X, D, S, and V. X and D modes are for PC—X for X-input games and D for D-input games, with D also supporting Android devices (phones, tablets, smart TVs). S mode is for Switch devices, and V mode is for iOS devices (phones, iPads). Choose the appropriate mode before connecting. Ensure your device supports Bluetooth for wireless connections, as it won’t work otherwise. Wireless connections are available on Windows 7/8/10; a wired connection is required for Windows 11.

How to Switch to New Device: If need switch to new device for wireless controller, fistly, turn off the controller; senconly, according the new device, switch to right mode on the back of controller, and the press and hold "Home" button until the light flash, and this time, connecting controller on the new device.

How to choose connect mode when connect with PC? 
Windows operating system can use X & D mode in this controller. 
X mode = X input, which is widely applied to AAA Games and the newest games ofMicrosoft and Steam.D mode = D input, which is compatible with windows, analog games, etc 
Does it support Xbox? 
No, it does not support Xbox. 
Does it support Samsung TV？ 
It can work with Samsung TV, but not support work under bluetooth mode. 
Does it can work with IOS? 
It can work with IOS under V mode, only MFI-certified games are supported, and touchscreen games cannot be played directly.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Perfectly compatible with Switch/Switch Lite/Switch OLED, you can play any game on the console as you like. 
About Turbo Function: 
Press "Up” arrow on the D-pad and "T" button: Increase burst speed 
Press "Down” arrow on the D-pad and "T" button: reduce burst speed 
Three-level speed: 5 shot/s, 12 shot/s, 20 shot/s. 
During bursts, the indicator light will flash. 
The higher the controller's burst speed, the faster the indicator light will flash. 
About the Extra Mappable Trigger M1/M2: 
1. The back button on the controller is easy to program and adjust. 
2. This controller can map up to 16 buttons. 
3. You can map the M1/M2 button one by one. 
4. Press M1/M2 and "—": map only one button 
5. Press M1/M2 and "+": map the key combination 
6. When you want to use the ultimate skill with one key in the games, you can set key combination. 
7. The speed at which a key is mapped affects how quickly it reacts in-game. 
Setting Method: 
(assuming you want to map the Y+B+A+L+R buttons on M1 button) 
1. Press "M1" and "+" at the same time, and the lights on the controller will flash slowly; 
2. Press the Y/B/A/L/R button on the controller one by one, and the indicator light will flash quickly 
3. Finally press the M1 button, the indicator light will be on, indicating that the mapping is completed. 
Close the Mappable M1/M2 Function: 
If you don't want to use the mapping function of the M1/M2 buttons, your hands may habitually touch these two buttons, which will affect the game. Steps: Press and hold the "—" and "T" buttons for 3s, and after the wireless controller vibrates for 1s, the function is closed. 
How To Connect? 
Sync to Console: 
1. In the N-SL main menu, click on 'Controller'一'Change grip/sequence', and enter the Controller pairing mode; 
2. Press and hold the "Y"+HOME button for 4s to enter the pairing state. The LED flashes frequently. The controller is automatically paired with the console. After the connection is successful, the LED been on; 
3. When the connection is successful, you can press the HOME button, and the LED will flash slowly in the form of a marquee and automatically reconnect. 
Sync to PC with A USB Cable: 
1. Use the USB cable to connect the gamepad and the computer. After connection, LED1 and LED4 of the gamepad flash slowly at the same time. Successfully connected, the gamepad can be normally used. 
2. The controller defaults to Xinput mode on the PC side, and the keys are XBOX 360 key layout, non-standard PC key layout. 
3. In XINPUT mode, hold down the screenshot button for 3 seconds to convert to DINPUT mode.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The officially licensed PowerA Nano Wired Controller for Nintendo Switch combines standard-size controls with a compact frame. Now, players of all sizes can game with ergonomic comfort on a high-quality controller. The standard-size ABXY button layout is larger than the Joy-Con buttons to provide a familiar comfortable feel for even the most intense sessions. Precision-tuned analog thumbsticks and ultra-responsive triggers provide optimum performance for any game. Plus, original designs from world-class artists feature stunning graphics and iconic characters that represent your style and favorite games. Includes an 8 ft. (2.4 m) micro-USB cable. 
Wireless Freedom 
The PowerA Enhanced Wireless controller for Nintendo Switch frees you from the shackles of cables, so that you can kick back, get comfortable and play from anywhere in the room. 
Immersive Motion Controls 
Dive even deeper into your games with fluid, responsive motion controls that provide an intuitive way to aim, steer, fly and more. 
Advanced Gaming Buttons 
Get an edge over the competition with mappable Advanced Gaming Buttons you can program on-the-fly, mid-game—no system settings to configure. 
Officially Licensed 
Officially licensed by Nintendo. PowerA products have gone through Nintendo’s rigorous testing and evaluation processes to ensure compatibility with the Nintendo Switch.

title: SteelSeries Stratus Duo Wireless Gaming Controller – Compatible with Android, Windows, VR, and Chromebooks – Dual-Wireless Connectivity – High-Performance Materials – Supports Fortnite Mobile
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Controllers › Gamepads & Standard Controllers
description: The Stratus Duo brings a true wireless console gaming experience to Android, Windows, Chromebook, VR, and more. Use Bluetooth for setup-free gaming on Android mobile devices, or swap to 2.4GHz wireless to play on Windows and 5, 000+ controller-enabled games on steam. Stratus duo's high-performance joysticks and triggers register inputs faster and more accurately than touchscreens and standard controllers. A rechargeable lithium ion battery provides 20+ hours of battery life, so you can easily play wherever you go. Compatible with PC (Windows 11/10/7), Steam, VR (Oculus Rift, Oculus Go, Samsung Gear VR), Android 3.1+, ChromeOS
features: Fortnite Ready on Android – A true console experience on Android mobile with software free setup. Just pair and play
2.4 GHz Wireless – Lag free gaming on Windows and over 5,000 controller enabled titles on steam
Bluetooth Wireless: Easily pair with Oculus Go, Gear VR, Android mobile devices, and more
Rechargeable battery: 20-plus hours of nonstop use, as well as the ability to play while charging
High Quality Hardware: Comfortable full size ergonomic controller built to last a lifetime
This product is tested and certified as Works With Chromebook, which means it meets Google’s compatibility standards and works seamlessly with your Chromebook.

This product works with devices capable of running the latest version of Chrome OS and has been certified to meet Google's compatibility standards. Google is not responsible for the operation of this product or its compliance with safety requirements. Android, Chromebook, and the Works With Chromebook badge are trademarks of Google LLC.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Easily Pair and Play 
Enjoy Fortnite Mobile 
Easily pair and play Fortnite Mobile and all controller-supported Android games with no additional software, so you can enjoy your favorite mobile games on-the-go. 
Steam-Enabled 
No drivers or software needed! Easily pair and play all 5000+ controller-enabled Steam games and enjoy full Steam Big Picture Mode and Steam Link support. 
Two Controllers in One 
With the flick of a switch, swap between 2.4GHz wireless for Windows, Chromebook, and Steam, and Bluetooth wireless for Android, Oculus Go, and Samsung Gear VR. 
Precision and Performance 
Trigger Design 
Magnetic Hall Effect triggers are more durable than their traditional counterparts, maintaining their snappy and reliable performance over a lifetime of use. 
High-Performance Hardware 
The full size ergonomic design and clickable analog joysticks give you precision and performance, whether you’re carefully aiming or button mashing. 
20+ Hour Battery Life 
A lithium-ion battery provides 20+ hours of nonstop playtime, and can also recharge while playing using the included Micro USB cable.

title: Gammeefy Switch Controller, Wireless Switch Pro Controller for Nintendo Switch/Lite/OLED, 9 Color Adjustable LED Switch Remote Compatible with PC/Android/IOS with Programmable Function
breadCrumbs: Video Games › Nintendo Switch › Interactive Gaming Figures
features: 【Unique Cracked Design & Custom Lighting Effects】 Your switch controllers will have adjustable LED lights in 9 different colors, You can switch the color you like at any time. If you choose red, its effect will be like hot "magma"; If you choose blue, it will be like a brilliant lightning! Buy it now, light up your favorite light in the night, you will be the coolest among your friends

【Compatible With Switch Console/Ios/Android/PC】Upgraded switch controllers not only compatible with Switch Console, and also is available for iOS/Android/PC. Gaming controllersupports wireless connection to play switch games, iOS MFI games(IOS 13.0 and above), Android HID games; also can be via USB wired connection with PC to support playing X-Input and Steam games.(Windows 7 and above), If you need a Bluetooth receiver to connect to your PC, you can choose the Blue·tooth model

[Programming Function Of Switch controller] You will get the Switch controller with programming function. The wireless switch controller has 2 back buttons "M1/M2", and these two function buttons can be programmed with 1-16 basic buttons. When programming the buttons, the pro controller will record the time interval you press each button, you can release combo skills with one button to easily defeat bosses, make the game operation more smooth and relax your fingers

【Adjustable Light Mode】The wireless switch controller has 9 LED light colors to choose from: 8 colors and rainbow LED colors, which can be easily switched by simply pressing the light button on the back; 4 light modes: breathing light mode, constant light mode, Flashing light mode and off. In addition, you can also adjust the

【1000mah Battery Capacity】To meet players’ gaming time needs, we increased the battery capacity of the switch controller to 1000mah, which is twice the capacity of other controllers. The package includes a UBS-C charging cable, and a 3-hour charge can last about 12-16 hours, even with the light effect on can also ensure longer game length (play time used without the light effect will be longer)

【Adjustable Turbo & Vibration Function】Wireless Switch Pro Controller can be set to auto TURBO or manual TURBO mode. You can set TURBO to A/B/X/Y/L/ZL/R/ZR keys. There are 3 adjustable speed: 5shots/s, 12 shots/s or 20 shots/s. What’s more, switch turbo controller also have dual vibration motors with 4-level precise vibration: None, Weak, Medium and Strong that provide you excellent vibration feedback to enhance the game immersion

【Easier Pairing And Wake-Up Function】After entering the console connection interface, simply press and hold the SYNC button of the switch pro controller to connect until the signal light flashes to complete the first connection. Next time, just press the "HOME" button to wake up your console

【Ergonomic Design & High Perfomance Buttons】The switch pro controller’s ergonomic design practically makes it melt into your hand. And the cracked design has a non-slip effect that allows you to control the game stably and don’t have to worry about the sweat in your hands. All buttons of the wireless switch controller are clicky without feeling cheap and the triggers have the perfect amount of travel; short and sweet without feeling restrictive
【After Sales & Support】If you have any tech problems or suggestions about this pro controller switch please let us know, we will reply to you within 24 hours and provide support for you

breadCrumbs: Cell Phones & Accessories › Accessories › Gaming Accessories › Controllers
features: Compatible with PS Remote Play, Xbox Game Pass Ultimate, Steam Link, GeForce NOW; Apple Arcade and MFi games & hundreds of popular mobile games including Fortnite, Minecraft, Genshin Impact, Brawlhalla, Asphalt 9: Legends, Cyberpunk 2077, Destiny 2, Gear 5 and Halo Collection emulators, & many more.

Easy to startup: Only hold on power button for 3 seconds, you can connect your iphone via Bluetooth. The latency is non existent, ShanWan Q11 has been upgraded Bluetooth 5.0, not pressure being applied to your phone's USB-C port.

Ultra-long battery life: Built-in rechargeable battery which allows games to play games for about 25 hours under normal using and quickly recharges in just under 2 hours with the included Type-C Charging cable. Shuts off on its own when you leave it over 15 mins on for a while to save power.

The newest design to solve the bulky camera-bump-The left side of the controller has a sunken design you can still fit the new phones in to the controller base without messing up your phone camera lens and the phone sits very securely in the middle of the controller arms.
ShanWan Controller app for free, which serves as a hub for all your games, recommends new games. The ShanWan Controller can still be used as a gaming controller without ShanWan Controller app.

Customers Frequently Asked Questions: 
Q: 1. What can of application do I need to download to use this controller? A: No application needed. Plug it in and your PC or Respberry Pi will recognize it. 
Q: 2. Work with steam games on pc? A: No, not support steam games. 
Q: 3. Will this work for Tesla Atari games? A: If you're using an Atari emulator on PC or Mac, then it will. 
Q: 4. Can I use it to play online games? A: No, this controller not supports online games. 
Q: 5. Why my controller inputting both joystick and keyboard buttons? A: What emulator are you using? Difficulty on mapping the buttons depends on the emulator. We recommend using SNES9X on PC, OpenEmu on Mac, Retropie on Respberry Pi. 
Tips: 
1. Plug in the controller first before open the emulator or power on the raspberry pi, so your device could detect the controller easily. 
2. VirtuaNES is perfect emulator for Windows PC. 
3. RESET the controller before the first use.

features: 🎮【OLED Custom Design】White cracks are all over the front shell of the controller, RGB lights hidden on the motherboard will glow through these cracks. With additive color models that reproduce a broad array of colors by combining different intensities of red, green, and blue light, form a cool game lighting atmosphere.

🎮【Luminous Mode Change】Press "right joystick+share" to switch light mode: colorful light, breath light, flashing light and light off. Press "right joystick" and Move up or down "left joystick" to adjust brightness. 4 different light models of Solid OLED/Breath OLED/RGB OLED/OLED Off model.

🎮【Perfect Compatibility】AceGamer wireless controller compatible with PS4/Pro/Slim/Windows PC. ❗*Attention*❗: Only when connecting for the first time, you must activate the device with the USB cable for the first pairing and connection. After that, the normal wireless connection of Bluetooth can be made, and USB data cable is no longer needed. ❗*Note*❗: Connecting to PC(without Bluetooth) needs to install receiver, not included.

🎮【High Capacity & Long Life】The wireless controllers for PS4 built-in 1000mAh battery which provide more than 10 hours playing time on RGB OLED lit mode, you can enjoy longer game playing without interruption, only need 3 hours to fully charged with an included USB type-c fast charging cable.

🎮【Function Highlights】360° Refined analog sticks without dead zone, the new touch pad on the face of the game controller offer players precise control. Controller which built-in 6-axis gyro sensor has dual motor vibration, excellent dual shock effect design makes the tactile sense more sensitive. The optimized buttons and triggers, ergonomic design non-slip grips, which offer you fantastic gaming experience.

🎮【To Be AceGamer】You can get: 1x RGB Wireless Controller for ps4; 1x Charging Cable; 1x User Manual; Professional after-sales service. We focus on the design, production and sales of custom controllers. If you have any questions, please contact us in any time!

title: PDP Gaming REMATCH Enhanced Wired Controller Licensed for Xbox Series X|S/Xbox One/PC/Windows, Mappable Back Buttons, Advanced Customizable App - Purple Fade
breadCrumbs: Video Games › Xbox Series X & S › Accessories › Controllers
description: Ready for a rematch? Take your enemies down again and again with the enhanced features and customizability of the Purple Fade REMATCH Advanced Wired Controller, officially licensed by Xbox. Rethink the way you game using the two programmable back buttons to map controller functions and take down ops quickly and efficiently. Enjoy improved accuracy with the textured grips, thumbsticks, and triggers. With the built-in volume controls on the D-pad and quick mic mute, you can make rapid-fire adjustments without ruining your immersion. Enhance your gaming experience further by customizing your controller on the free PDP Control Hub app. Re-map buttons, reconfigure triggers, adjust deadzones, update controller firmware, and more. Connect the included 8-foot USB-C cable to upgrade your gaming with the officially licensed REMATCH Advanced Wired Controller.
features: CUSTOMIZE SETTINGS FOR YOUR BEST GAMEPLAY - Use the free PDP Control Hub App to re-map buttons, re-configure triggers, adjust dead zones, and more.
COMMUNICATE WITH EASE - Link your headset using 3.5mm audio jack and mute your mic by double tapping the "Function" button. Pair with the PDP Airlite Wired Headset.

DESIGNED FOR IN-GAME EFFICIENCY - Adjust your game and chat audio on-the-fly using the audio controls located on the D-pad. Share your captured images and videos easily with the dedicated share button in the center.

LAG-FREE, WIRED COMPATIBILITY - This wired controller promises unlimited play time without needing batteries, and its detachable 8ft cable let's you move spots with ease. Officially licensed by Microsoft for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Windows 10/11.
Licensed by Xbox

items.text:
Officially Licensed 
Put through rigorous quality and safety testing, performed by Xbox, to become a licensed product.

Game/Chat Balance
Quickly adjust your game/chat balance without having to go into the console settings. Simply use the "Function" button and right/left on the D-pad.

Textured Triggers
Added texture for increased accuracy, so you never miss your shot.

Programmable Back Buttons
Bind controller commands to the back buttons for quicker access to actions like jump, crouch/slide, reload, change weapons, and more.

Function Button/Mic Mute
Function" button can be used with the D-pad to adjust volume and game/chat balance, is used for programming the back buttons, and doubles as a mic mute button when you hit it twice.

Share Button
Share photos and videos of those epic game-winning moves, or face-palming fails, using the dedicated Share button.

Volume Up/Down
Fine-tune audio in a flash using the controller's "Function" button and up/down on the D-pad.

title: Ligame Switch Controller, Wireless Pro Controller for Switch/Lite/OLED, 4 Vibration Modes, 3 Turbo Modes, Compatible to iOS/Android/PC/Steam and TV with Programming/6-Axis/Motion/Wake-up/RGB
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Controllers
features: ⌾ [Multi Platforms Compatibility]: Our controllers are designed to be compatible with a wide range of platforms, and the upgraded Switch controllers are not only compatible with Nintendo Switch/Lite/OLED, but also PC (Windows 7 and above), iOS, and Android (TVs and TV boxes version 6.0 or higher). No matter which device you prefer to play on, our controllers offer seamless connectivity and a smooth gaming experience across multiple platforms.

⌾ [Programmable Functions of Game Switch Controller]: Bluetooth Game Controller with 2 programmable buttons, AR/AL= A+B+Y+L+ZL+R+ZR+D-pad and records up to 30 seconds of game action, Pro Controller Switch with Programmable Buttons helps to minimise button abuse, Mobile Controller with ABXY Function Switch to freely switch between Nintendo Switch layouts and Xbox layouts.

⌾ [Adjustable Vibration and Turbo]: Nintendo Pro controller with asymmetrical dual motors offers 4 adjustable vibration intensities (0%50%70%100%) to provide you with excellent vibration capabilities, enhancing game immersion and delivering the best gaming experience. The Android controller with auto and manual turbo function offers 3 adjustable turbo speeds (5/10/15 rounds/second) to take your gaming session to the next level with customised TURBO!

⌾ [6-Axis Gyro Motion Control and One-Touch Wake-Up]: With the 6-axis gyro sensor you can immerse yourself in your favourite games with advanced aiming, tilt control, and the Switch Pro Wireless Controller provides an excellent experience when playing physical games. With the one-touch wake-up feature of the mobile game controller, when your Nintendo Switch is in sleep mode, you can wake it up in less than 1 second by pressing the "HOME" button.

⌾ [Cool RGB and Screenshot Buttons]: LED Light Switch Pro Controller forms a cool gaming lighting atmosphere. Looks very cool at night or in the dark. 5 adjustable light modes: constant light, breathing light, RGB strobe LED light and LED off, memory function will go to the last LED mode. You can also adjust the brightness of the LEDs. Plus the Nintendo Switch controller has a dedicated screenshot button to capture screenshots, a great way to share your favourite gameplay footage.

⌾ [Ergonomic Design with 800 mAh Battery]: The mobile controller is made of high quality ABS material with non-slip textured grip and curved frosted shell for a more comfortable grip, and the redesigned grip prevents hands fatigue after long hours of gaming. The Bluetooth controller has a built-in 800 mAh rechargeable battery that provides up to 15-20 hours of gameplay and takes only 2-3 hours to fully charge.

⌾ [What You Will Get]: Package Contents: 1 x Wireless Switch Controller; 1 x C-Cable; 1 x User Manual. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we can provide 24-hour service, 360-day hassle-free refund policy or free replacement

title: THRUSTMASTER HEART Controller, Hall Effect Gamepad with H.E.A.R.T. Anti-drift Technology (Xbox Series X|S & PC)
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Controllers › Gamepads & Standard Controllers
description: The Thrustmaster HEART CONTROLLER gamepad features the H.E.A.R.T. (HallEffect AccuRate Technology) Hall effect technology, backed by 15 years of proven expertise in magnetic sensor measurement technology for flight simulation. H.E.A.R.T. provides exceptional, long-lasting precision, allowing mini-stick movement to be tracked to within 0.01 degree while eliminating drift. All of the HEART CONTROLLER buttons are mechanical, which improves the responsiveness of actions between the player and the game, providing activation travel of only 0.3 mm. Lighter than a conventional joystick, the central RGB LED color can be customized among 6 colors. This officially licensed Xbox product is compatible with Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and PCs running Windows
features: H.E.A.R.T. Hall effect technology prevents drift, for an extended lifespan
Exceptional and durable precision with movement tracking to within 0.01 degree
15 years of expertise with H.E.A.R.T. Hall effect technology, already used in flight simulation joysticks
Mechanical buttons 64% faster than conventional membrane-based buttons, with an activation distance reduced to 0.3 mm
2 additional remappable buttons at the back of HEART CONTROLLER
Central RGB LED allowing users to choose between 6 customizable colors
Officially licensed for Xbox, compatible with Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
PULSE BEYOND TIME 
The HEART CONTROLLER gamepad incorporates 15 years of expertise in the H.E.A.R.T. (HallEffect AccuRate Technology) Hall effect technology developed for advanced flight simulation. Achieve unparalleled precision and consistency over time, with movement tracking to within 0.01 degree. 
Say goodbye to mini-stick drift, and enjoy unbelievably-precise performance that won't decrease over time, thanks to Hall effect technology! 
ANTI-DRIFT MAGNETIC REVOLUTION 
Endorsed by gamers, H.E.A.R.T. (HallEffect AccuRateTechnology) represents 15 years of Thrustmaster expertise in Hall effect technology applied to flight simulation joysticks. H.E.A.R.T. provides you with unparalleled precision over time, while eliminating drift through ultra-precise magnetic sensors that measure your stick movements. Providing you with optimal control, even after hundreds of hours of gameplay. 
PERFORMANCE THAT DEFIES TIME 
Drift is a common problem where your cursor moves on its own, even when you are no longer touching the stick. On traditional gamepads, the potentiometer technology wears out over time, which leads to a loss of precision and causes drift. With H.E.A.R.T., the position is measured without mechanical friction, eliminating drift completely. As a result, the gamepad keeps its initial precision like the very first day. 
PURE PRECISION 
With H.E.A.R.T., your sticks capture every movement with surgical precision, within 0.01 degree. You enjoy optimal responsiveness that faithfully reproduces each of your actions. It’s a real game changer, especially for games where precision is essential. You have total control and unerring precision in your movements, even in the most intense situations. 
UNPARALLELED RESPONSIVENESS 
You will be immediately won over by the exceptional responsiveness of the mechanical buttons, which bests the speed of traditional membrane-based buttons* by 64%. Enjoy greater responsiveness and perform your actions faster than your opponents through a lower activation distance of only 0.3 mm. 
CREATE AND SET YOUR OWN STYLE 
Take control of your HEART CONTROLLER with complete configuration of the settings and central LED colors. With ThrustmapperX software, you can freely customize the sensitivity of the sticks, trigger activation travel, and remap the 2 rear buttons of the gamepad to suit your gaming preferences and style.

title: TIANHOO PS4 Controller, Wireless PS4 Controller for PS4/Pro/Slim, with Vibration Feedback, Motion Sensing, Touchpad, Light Bar, Share, Speaker, 3.5mm Headphone Jack (Graffiti)
breadCrumbs: Video Games › PlayStation 4 › Accessories › Controllers › Racing Wheels
features: Super Compatibility - The wireless PS4 controller is fully compatible with PS4/Slim/Pro (The first connection to console requires to use the included USB-C charging cable to activate the device). Press and hold the "SHARE+HOME" button on PS4 controller for 3 seconds to pair with PC Windows.

Innovative Features - Revolutionary features like the touch pad, integrated light bar, and built-in speaker offer exciting ways to experience and interact with your games, and its 3.5mm audio jack offers a practical personal audio solution for gamers who want to listen to their games in private.

Precision Control - The PS4 controller buttons are sensitive, providing timely feedback and accurately responding to player actions. The precision and speed of the joystick allow players to more accurately control the movement and aiming of their characters in the game.

Enhanced Vibration - Feel the action of your favorite games right in your hands as this PS4 controller generates intense vibration feedback during all the hits, explosions, crashes and other high-intensity moments of your games.

6-Axis Motion Sensing - The 6-axis gyro of the PS4 controller can detect the rotation on three different axes, so that the characters or objects in the game can accurately respond to the player's hand movements. This means players can experience a more realistic and precise sense of control in racing, flight simulation, or sports games.

Sharing at Your Fingertips - The share button makes sharing your greatest gaming moments as easy as a push of a button. Upload gameplay videos and screenshots directly from your system or live-stream your gameplay, all without disturbing the game in progress.
Package Includes - 1 * PS4 controller wireless, 1 * USB C charge cable, 1 * user manual

breadCrumbs: Video Games › PC › Accessories › Controllers
features: Widely Compatible & Easy to Pair & Wake-up: The Switch Controller is widely compatible with Nintendo Switch/Switch Lite/Switch OLED, iOS (MFI mode), Android (HID mode) and Windows 7/8/10/11. ZRZLMVP Switch pro controller pairing is very simple and easy to use, supporting one-click pairing. One-key Wake-up Function: Press the "HOME" button to wake up the console and re-sync. It supports wireless and wired connections, please read the user manual before pairing (Note: No NFC Function)

Cool RGB Light & 9 Colors & 5 Modes: The Switch controller for Nintendo has cool crackle lightning style RGB light, 9 bright colors, adding a sense of futuristic technology and providing gameplay in dim environments. 5 light modes: rainbow breathing mode, Single Color Breathe Mode, Static Mode, Flashing mode and LED Off Mode. You can choose different lighting modes and brightness (40%-60%-80%-100%) to customize your gaming experience and immerse yourself deeply in the gaming experience

Programmable Button & Turbo Function: Pro Switch Controller can programmable, map some basic buttons (A/B/X/Y/L/ZL/R/ZR.... up to 16) to back buttons（M1/M2）. Two mapping methods: Single & Multiple programming mapping. Press and hold the button SL/ SR for 3 seconds to turn on the ML or MR (5-second interval) cycle output mode. It also supports auto & manual Turbo, 3 adjustable speeds: 5shots/s, 12 shots/s and 25 shots/s. It will help you release all complex skills in time, avoid finger fatigue

Motion Control & 4 Level Rumble Vibration: The Switch Pro Controller built-in 6-axis gyro sensor easily senses the tilt of the controller to precisely control direction and viewing angle, helping you respond quickly. Built-in dual vibration motors with 4 levels of HD rumble vibration feedback: none, weak, medium, and strong. Really restore the vibration feedback of the game. High-sensitivity joysticks and smooth buttons with virtually no input lag and drift

1000mAh Battery & 16H Gaming & Type-C Charge: The wireless switch controller has a built-in ultra-long-lasting 1000mAh high-quality long-life battery, which can provide over 16 hours of gaming time in RGB lighting mode, so you can enjoy longer gaming sessions without interruption. A USB Type-C charging cable is included in the package, which can be used for fast charging with no frequent battery replacement. It only takes 2-3 hours to fully charge this switch controllers

Ergonomic & Non-slip Design & Screenshot: The pro controller for Nintendo adopts an ergonomic design, and the curvature of the handle perfectly adapts to the hand structure, and you will not feel fatigued when holding it for a long time. Made of non-slip and anti-sweat satin texture material, it feels skin-friendly and comfortable to hold, so you don't have to worry about sweaty palms. It supports one-key screenshots, allowing you to capture wonderful moments in the game

Best Present for You & Family & Friends: The switch wireless controller can be a special present for you, family, friends, etc. You can not only enjoy your leisure time alone but also start entertainment moments with your precious family and friends. Press the "Y + HOME" button to connect for the first time. Then next time just simply presses the "HOME" button of the pro switch controller to wake up your device. It's very convenient for you to start the game

【VIBRATE FUNCTION & GYRO SENSOR】 Switch controllers have dual vibration motors with 3-level precise vibration: weak, medium and strong that provide you excellent vibration feedback to enhance the game immersion. With the 6-axis gyro sensor, switch remote can detect the inclination of the controller and make a quick response, give you more fun while playing motion sensing games.( Only switch device has six-axis)

【1000MAH BATTERY CAPACITY】We've increased the switch controller’s battery capacity to 1000 mah just to provide a long time of fun. Package including a UBS-C charging cable, just charge 3 Hours for the wireless pro switch controller can provide 15 Hours, Get rid of the worry of “low battery” when you immerse in the games

【ERGONOMIC DESIGN & INCREASE WEIGHT】 The pro controller switch remote's ergonomic and non-slip design that allows you to control the game stably and don’t have to worry about the sweat in your hands. By investigating the switch gamers’ usage experience, we have increased the weight on previous switch controller, making it more comfortable to use

【DURABILITY & SUPPORT】 This switch controller has just the right amount of heft and durability so that you feel comfortable playing the Switch without feeling insecure. If you have any tech problems about this pro controller switch please let us know, we will reply to you within 24 hours and provide support for you

title: Switch Controller, Wireless Switch Pro Controller for Switch/Switch Lite/Switch OLED, 8 Colors Adjustable LED Wireless Remote Gamepad with Unique Crack/Turbo/Motion Control (Black)
breadCrumbs: Video Games › Nintendo Switch › Accessories › Controllers

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Design for Switch & Switch Lite
This wireless controller is perfect for Switch & Switch Lite, allowing you to play any game on your console with ease.
Advanced Function
Equipped with a sophisticated 6-axis motion sensor, dual vibration motors, and turbo function, this controller delivers fast response times and minimal delay, giving you a competitive edge.
Stable Wireless Connection
The wireless connection is stable up to 23 feet, providing less interference and a reliable connection so you can play without interruption.
Unique cracking process
BINBOK's team uses an uncommon surface coating with a unique cracking process to create truly distinctive controllers. Each controller undergoes rigorous inspections to ensure unparalleled quality.
-------------------
Stunning 8-Color Adjustable LED Lighting! 
With the adjustable LED button, you can customize the lighting mode of your switch controller to your liking. 
Regular Mode
Easily cycle through colors by pressing the LED button: blue, red, green, yellow, cyan, orange, purple, and pink.
Breathing Light Mode
Activate breathing light mode and cycle through colors with a press of the LED button. The colors will smoothly transition in a breathing-like pattern.
Vibration Mode
The light illuminates with controller vibration.
Joystick Mode
The light color changes as you move the joystick.
Axis Mode
All lights illuminate with the movement of the 6-axis gyro.
Experience the ultimate personalized gaming experience with BINBOK's adjustable LED lighting modes.
-------------------
Enhanced Gaming Experience 
Our wireless switch controller is designed and improved based on the original equipment, providing you with a superior gaming experience. Enjoy zero-delay and precise control with high-sensitivity buttons, which increase your combat effectiveness and overall gaming performance. 
Ergonomic Design & Unique Coating 
Experience ultimate comfort during extended gaming sessions with our lightweight and ergonomic wireless switch controller, designed to perfectly fit the shape of your hand. The unique surface coating provides a distinctive feel and enhances your overall gaming experience. 
6-Axis Somatosensory Control 
Our controllers are equipped with one accelerometer and one gyroscope, providing 6-axis somatosensory control for rapid and accurate motion control without any delay. Experience improved accuracy and precision during gameplay with our advanced motion control technology.
